feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-19T06:02:38.071095Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;同时在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an -indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T04:02:00.662273Z</updated>; <link href= “https://juicybeast.com/2016/01/11/releasing-an-indie-game-on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially/#2-years”/>; <作者>; <名称>;plateofsoup</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plateofsoup</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http:// juicybeast.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/legrimpeur_HD_cropped.png" style="width: 220px; height: 100px;" />;<br />;一次在 3 个游戏机上发布独立游戏并在财务上失败（2016 年）<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#releasing-an-indie-game- on-3-consoles-at-once-and-failing-financially-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36387030" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Swing VPN 应用是一个 DDoS 僵尸网络</stitle>; <id>;https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T19:02:00.663356Z</已更新>; <link href="https://lecromee.github.io/posts/swing_vpn_ddosing_sites/"/>; <author>; <name>;campuscodi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=campuscodi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lecromee.github.io/image/swing/android_install.png" style="width: 220px; height: 107px;" />;<br />;Swing VPN 应用程序通过将其用户转变为攻击僵尸网络，利用其用户群对 DDOS 站点进行攻击。该应用程序每 10 秒向特定网站发送一次请求，以特定端点为目标使网络过载服务器的资源。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#swing-vpn-app-is-a-ddos-botnet" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36382700” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;想象中的问题是糟糕软件的根源</stitle>; <id>;https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-18T15:02:00.665363Z</updated>; <link href="https://cerebralab.com/Imaginary_Problems_Are_the_Root_of_Bad_Software"/>; <author>; <name>;deofoo</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=deofoo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/c0/De_Rebus_Bellicis, _XVth_Century_Miniature.JPG" style="width: 220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;糟糕软件的根本原因往往是虚构的问题。开发人员和其他部门创造虚构的问题来使他们的工作更有趣或填补空白。这导致忽视了真正的问题需要解决。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#imaginary-problems-are-the-root-of-bad-software" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380711" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Keycloak – 开源身份和访问管理访谈</stitle>; <id>;https://console.substack.com/i /128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:02:00.665904Z</updated >; <link href="https://console.substack.com/i/128451029/interview-with-michal-of-keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-for-modern-applications"/>; <author>; <name>;ph4ni</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ph4ni</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic% 2Fimages%2F1f02d299-2c64-4e17-a333-47d3054df48d_1600x836.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Keycloak 是一种用于现代应用程序和服务的开源身份和访问管理解决方案。它提供了一种简单而安全的身份验证和用户管理方法，支持 OpenID Connect、OAuth 等标准协议2.0 和 SAML。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#keycloak-open-source-identity-and-access-management-interview" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;旅行报告：保加利亚瓦尔纳夏季 ISO C++ 标准会议</stitle>; <id>;https://herbsutter.com/2023 /06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T03:02:00.666298Z</更新>; <link href="https //herbsutter.com/2023/06/16/trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-varna-bulgaria/"/>; <author>; <name>;agluszak</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=agluszak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://herbsutter.files.wordpress.com/2023/06/ image.png?w=300" style="width: 220px; height: 162px;" />;<br />;ISO C++ 委员会最近结束了在保加利亚瓦尔纳举行的会议，他们开始在 C++26 中采用特性。他们有来自 20 个国家的近 180 名与会者，并采纳了前 40 个提议更改 C++26 的文件，包括错误修复和新功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trip-report-summer-iso-c-standards-meeting-in-varna-bulgaria " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;世界海洋中有多少沉船？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T01:02 :00.668413Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20230609-how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-worlds-oceans"/>; <作者>; <name>;Thevet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Thevet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //ychef.files.bbci.co.uk/976x549/p0ft978s.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本周联合国教科文组织宣布发现三艘新沉船，其中两艘已有数千年历史。根据联合国教科文组织的分析，世界海洋中有超过三百万艘未被发现的沉船。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-many-shipwrecks-are-there-in-the-world-s-oceans" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36374370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Redbean Systems</stitle>; <id>;https://redbean.systems/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T21 :02:00.668779Z</updated>; <link href="https://redbean.systems/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是一个Python脚本，它为运行客户端代码设置了一个安全的沙箱。它使用了Cosmopolitan库并实现了各种安全措施，例如资源限制、进程分叉和系统调用限制。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#redbean-systems" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36383875" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;HDR二维码</stitle>; <id>;https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:02:00.669167Z</updated>; < link href="https://notes.dt.in.th/HDRQRCode"/>; <author>; <name>;fdb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fdb< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://notes.dt.in.th/d7fc70-circle-192.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px ;" />;<br />;这是一个 HDR 二维码。如果您在 Apple 设备的内置显示器上查看它，它应该可以工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hdr-qr-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36384625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;苏联向美国出售钛，认为他们需要它来制作披萨烤箱</stitle>; <id>;https://theaviationgeekclub.com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union-sold-titanium -对我们来说，他们相信他们需要它来制作比萨饼烤箱，但他们却用它来建造标志性的 SR-71-blackbird-mach-3-spy -plane/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:02:00.669520Z</updated>; <link href="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/in-the-early-1960s-soviet-union-sold - 钛对我们来说相信他们需要它来制作比萨饼烤箱，但他们却用它来建造标志性的 SR-71-blackbird-mach-3 -spy-plane/"/>; <author>; <name>;jerryjerryjerry</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jerryjerryjerry</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://theaviationgeekclub.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/SR-71-Pizza-oven.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;远程侦察机 SR-71 黑鸟的建造需要钛。美国秘密从他们的冷战敌人苏联购买钛来建造 SR- 71. 苏联人认为美国需要钛来制作披萨烤箱，却不知道他们正在为制造间谍飞机做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#soviet-union-sold-titanium- to-us-believing-they-needed-it-for-pizza-ovens" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36384548" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Show HN：Answer Overflow – 将 Discord 内容编入网络</stitle>; <id>;https://www.answeroverflow.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:02:00.669870Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.answeroverflow.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;rhyssullivan1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rhyssullivan1 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.answeroverflow.com/answer-overflow-banner-v3.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;Answer Overflow 是一个开源项目，旨在将 discord 频道引入您最喜爱的搜索引擎，使用户能够轻松、快速地找到他们需要的信息。了解您的社区最关心的问题以及在何处改进您的文档。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-answer-overflow-indexing-discord-content-into-the-web" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383773" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;再见，Twilio</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/post/再见-twilio</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T18:02:00.670223Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.miguelgrinberg.com/post/goodbye-twilio"/>; <author>; <名称>;joaopaulomcc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=joaopaulomcc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:/ /blog.miguelgrinberg.com/static/images/twilio-ask.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;差不多四年后，我不再是 Twilio 的员工。公司重心和愿景的转变不再符合我的价值观和信念。我现在正在寻找一家新公司开发者至上的文化。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#goodbye-twilio" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36382361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;GPU 编程：何时、为何以及如何？</stitle>; <id>;https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-19T01:02:00.670568Z</updated>; <link href="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://enccs.github.io/gpu-programming/_static/ ENCCS.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 236px;" />;<br />;图形处理单元 (GPU) 是全球许多高性能计算 (HPC) 系统的主力。Top500 中启用 GPU 的超级计算机的数量近年来一直在稳步增长并且这种发展有望继续。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpu-programming-when-why-and-how" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成</stitle>; <id>;https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:02:00.671612Z</updated>; <link href="https://boz.com/articles/get-it-done"/>; <author>; <name>;kiyanwang</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kiyanwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://boz.com/get- it-done.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;在我的职业生涯中，我发现我必须经常给出的建议是让人们更直接地利用他们的领导。我经常看到负责实现重要目标的人在巨大的困难面前尽最大努力。这样一份工作的任务不是“尽你所能”，而是完成它。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #get-it-done" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383322" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Miraheze 没有关闭</stitle >; <id>;https://meta.miraheze.org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T02:02:00.671974Z</更新>; <link href="https://meta.miraheze .org/wiki/Miraheze_is_Not_Shutting_Down"/>; <author>; <name>;pabs3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pabs3</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;这对 Miraheze 用户来说是个好消息。感谢为改进和保持服务运行所做的努力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#miraheze-is-not-shutting-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36386112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Internet Archive 中的图形设计项目</stitle>; <id>;https://archives.design</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T16:02:00.672666Z</已更新>; <link href="https://archives.design"/>; <author>; <name>;ptrkcsk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ptrkcsk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://64.media.tumblr.com/b3358f8c3dc112c69a102969134292a2/f105ae4737f8beeb-51/s400x600/2352c88f41dc41462c5a6bfb91d0b3b2 239be91c.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 275 像素；" />;<br />;1990年AIGA平面设计年鉴，展示了那个时期美国平面设计界最优秀的设计师。它展示了当年最重要的设计，还包含美国平面设计协会 1990 年奖项的获奖者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#graphic-design-items-from-internet-archive" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381330" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;语言学家发现了南佛罗里达州出现的一种新英语方言</stitle>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/linguists-have-identified-a-new- english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida-205620</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:02:00.673092Z</updated>; <link href="https://theconversation.com/linguists -have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida-205620"/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.theconversation.com/files/530654/original/file-20230607-23-bbcsrb .jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=3%2C9%2C2171%2C1548&q=20&auto=format&w=320&fit=clip&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=strip" style="width: 220px; height: 157px;" />;<br />;由于西班牙语和英语使用者之间的持续接触，南佛罗里达州出现了一种新的英语方言。这种方言的特点是借用西班牙语单词并直接从西班牙语翻译。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#linguists-have-identified-a-new-english-dialect-thats-emerging-in-south-florida" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36383521" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1990 年代的神经网络</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T01:02:00.673451Z</updated>; <link href="https://twitter.com/id_aa_carmack/status/1670558589746905090"/>; <author>; <name>;jrott</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jrott</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心——让我们再试一次. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neural-networks-in-the-1990s" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36385809" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;为什么你不能启动会议</stitle>; <id>;https://abnercoimbre.com/post/why-you-cant-kickstart-a-conference/< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T00:02:00.673812Z</更新>; <link href="https://abnercoimbre.com/post/why-you-cant-kickstart-a-conference/"/>; <author>; <name>;abnercoimbre</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=abnercoimbre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://abnercoimbre.com/images/50k_discussion_discord_1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 155px;" />;<br />;编程语言节未能在 Kickstarter 上筹集到足够的资金。组织者 Context Free 要求筹集 50,000 美元，但只筹集到 8,709 美元。这篇文章分析了会议不可行的原因并提供未来组织者的经验教训。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-you-can-t-kickstart-a-conference" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36385617" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;安全地将 Netflix 迁移到 GraphQL</stitle>; <id>;https://netflixtechblog.com/migrating-netflix-to-graphql-safely- 8e1e4d4f1e72?gi=4217a3fd9c5c</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T17:02:00.674162Z</更新>; <link href="https://netflixtechblog.com/migrating-netflix-to-graphql-safely-8e1e4d4f1e72 ?gi=4217a3fd9c5c"/>; <author>; <name>;theptip</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=theptip</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1200/1*u38PDW5BKHqtOEui3_WQjA.png" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;Netflix 使用 AB 测试、回放测试和 Sticky Canaries 等策略将其移动应用程序以零停机时间迁移到 GraphQL。他们最初在现有的 Falcor API 之上创建了一个 GraphQL shim，以使客户端工程师可以在不被服务器端迁移阻塞的情况下使用 GraphQL 进行实验。然后他们使用 AB 测试安全地启动阶段 1，并使用重放测试和 Sticky Canaries 启动阶段 2。迁移成功，100% 的流量都在移动主页画布在 6 个月内迁移到 GraphQL。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#migrating-netflix-to-graphql-safely" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36381764" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重建地球：用沙子建造的群岛正在带来新的生命</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature. com/immersive/d41586-023-01370-w/index.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T18:02:00.674507Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nature.com /immersive/d41586-023-01370-w/index.html"/>; <author>; <name>;cpeterso</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cpeterso</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nature.com/immersive/d41586-023-01370-w/assets/20Y6xR3l7f/2023-04-27_feature_marker-wadden_​​sh1-2560x1440 .jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Marker Wadden 是荷兰一个占地 1,300 公顷的群岛，自 2016 年以来几乎完全使用从 Markermeer 湖底疏浚的材料建造。它具有海洋特征，沙丘上长满了马拉姆草和散落在沙路上的贝壳 - 但它坐落在一个淡水湖中。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rewilding-the-planet-an-archipelago-constructed-of-sand-is- bringing-new-life" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368027" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MiniMit——让 Minitel 起死回生</ stitle>; <id>;https://xn--multipli-i1a.fr/en/5-21/objects/minimit</id>; <更新>;2023-06-18T21:02:00.675549Z</更新>; <链接href="https://xn--multipli-i1a.fr/en/5-21/objects/minimit"/>; <author>; <name>;jgrahamc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=jgrahamc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://xn--multipli-i1a.fr/media/full/minimit_01-1.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于复兴 Minitel 的，这是一台用于在线服务的法国先锋计算机。MiniMit 是一个连接到 Wifi 网络并包含十几个旧服务的迷你 Minitel。它是一个新旧技术之间的桥梁，带回 80 年代。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minimit-bringing-minitel-back-to-life" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371970" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;让微服务看起来像单体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/crufters/actio</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T20:02:00.675985Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/crufters/actio"/>; <author>; <name>;friendly_chap</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=friendly_chap</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crufters/ actio/main/assets/actiologo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;Actio 是一个现代的、包含电池的后端应用程序 Node.js (Typescript) 框架。它使您能够毫不费力地在单体和微服务架构之间切换。<a href="https:/ /hackernews.betacat.io/#make-microservices-look-like-monoliths" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36372283" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;海绵针状体</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sponge_spicule</id>; <updated>;2023-06-18T22:02:00.676334Z</updated>; <link href= "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sponge_spicule"/>; <author>; <name>;perihelions</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=perihelions</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/3f/Sponge-spicule_hg.jpg/260px-Sponge-spicule_hg.jpg " style="宽度: 220px; height: 174px;" />;<br />;骨针是在大多数海绵中发现的结构元素。它们提供结构支撑和防御捕食者。海绵骨针由碳酸钙或二氧化硅制成。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#sponge-spicule" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36384570" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
